name: Medevac
description:
Medevac Demo. 

The imbedded version runs a bit janky on my machine. Download and run the executable for a better experience. Feedback is more than welcome!

When you land at the base marked with the stick figure icon. An icon appears next to to the x, y coords on the HUD. This is reinforcements for the forward bases. When you land at a forward base, you drop off the reinforcements. If the base loses soldiers, it is repopulated with the reinforcements. 

There is no ending to the game yet. It will continue until you die or loose one of the forward bases. Then you can restart. I'm still working on the balance.
